segments.text: Well , frankly speaking , I am running a little behind . It's 40 % done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any problem during the process ? You should speed things up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have little chance to communicate with colleagues when I have problems . They are always too busy to help a green hand like me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever helped others when they are in trouble ? Most will give a hand to someone who has helped him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did . But I am so depressed because there is nobody that will help me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you should have good co-operation with other colleagues , you know a scientific schedule brings efficiency to the work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see your point , but I seem to be on bad terms with them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cheer up and pay more attention to your colleagues and the things will be much better . I am speaking from my experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you should read as much as possible to enrich the knowledge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . I can learn many useful things from books .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're approaching the critical point for success or failure of this project . you'd better speed up and catch up with books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I will do it better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you have any problem in your work , let me know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks very much . I promise I will work harder .
segments.speaker: S2
